feedback.text: Include relevant keywords such as 'website development' and 'show ROI' in the body content.
feedback.reasoning: Adding relevant keywords will help improve the SEO optimization of the article and make it more discoverable by search engines.

feedback.text: Use header tags (H1, H2, etc.) to structure the content and include keywords in them.
feedback.reasoning: Structured content with proper header tags not only improves readability but also helps search engines understand the context and relevancy of the content.

feedback.text: Include internal and external links related to website development and ROI to improve SEO.
feedback.reasoning: Incorporating relevant internal and external links can enhance the credibility of the article and improve its SEO ranking by providing additional context and resources to readers.

feedback.text: Add meta tags such as meta description with targeted keywords to improve search engine visibility.
feedback.reasoning: Meta tags like meta description play a crucial role in determining the click-through rate of the article in search engine results, so including them with targeted keywords is essential for SEO optimization.

feedback.text: Optimize image alt text with keywords related to website development and ROI.
feedback.reasoning: Optimizing image alt text not only improves accessibility but also provides another opportunity to include relevant keywords for SEO purposes, helping the article rank higher in image search results.
